scripts.install_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.run_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova build && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.android: rm -Rf _cordova && npm run-script install_cordova && npm run-script install_android_cordova && npm run-script cp_cordova && npm run-script run_android_cordova
scripts.compile-ts: cd src; find . -name "*.ts" | xargs ../node_modules/.bin/tsc -w --module commonjs --sourceMap; cd ../
scripts.make: npm run-script compile-ts && npm run-script bundle-client
scripts.serve: npm run-script make && cd src/client/static; node main.js
